cause.description:
I made this group to reassure people there is always an alternative to making life more profound, Through human intellect we can accomplish beyond our small, though recognizable spectrum, Lets teach our generation and younger ones to love and be loved, raise a new flag above our new distorted existence.
1. Stop rape, global warming (pedal instead), Stop racism, stop hunting for sport, Stop making others rule your world
2. Art definitely rules (Music, visual ect.)
3. Be yourself, live according to your standards, stop taking things in you have no need for
cause.mission: take a step back from this crazy world, to realize
cause.name: "One nation under a groove"
